articles.description: Here's who made the 2022 College Football Playoff.
articles.content:
The sixth and final College Football Playoff rankings for the 2021 season were revealed on Sunday, Dec. 5 on ESPN, when the four-team playoff field was announced.
All games played through Saturday, … [+4463 chars]

articles.title: What We Learned From The Big Ten Championship - Maize n Brew
articles.description: Destiny is calling Team 142 to do what the Wolverines have not done since 1948.
articles.content: The Michigan Wolverines are the 2021 Big Ten Champions and will play Georgia in the College Football Playoff semifinal on Dec. 31. A 17-year conference title drought is over and Michigan has a chance… [+3284 chars]

articles.title: Why Michigan, not Cincinnati, is the Cinderella of the College Football Playoff - mlive.com
articles.description: Michigan is the first playoff team to start the season unranked.
articles.content: At first glance, the Cinderella story in this years College Football Playoff is Cincinnati, the first team outside one of the so-called Power 5 conferences to qualify. Its Michigan, though, that will… [+2859 chars]
